original_text: I made you grow like a plant of the field. You grew and developed and entered puberty. Your breasts had formed and your hair had grown, yet you were stark naked.
korean_text: 내가 너를 들의 풀 같이 많게 하였더니 네가 크게 자라고 심히 아름다우며 유방이 뚜렷하고 네 머리털이 자랐으나 네가 여전히 벌거벗은 알몸이더라

sentences.original_text: I made you grow like a plant of the field.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 밭의 식물처럼 자라게 하였다.

sentences.original_text: You grew and developed and entered puberty.
